channel.title: Need help with my karils x bow spec
channel.description:
Allright so what I've done is pretty much copied the dark bow special and changed the projectiles and animations.
But whats weird is after it shoot once and does the special, the second hit he like punches him.. instead of shooting twice with the bow..
Can anyone help?
